title: Please help! I can't find this typeface anywhere.
content:
I am currently researching for a big project. I need help please, I am unable to discover the font used for Filter (music magazine) masthead.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [filter\_magazine.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202133257/http:/typophile.com/files/filter_magazine_0.jpg) | 2.84 KB |

 [‹ used in Martha Stewart Living Craft project and, I believe, recent broadcast ads for Kohl's](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202133257/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43280 "Go to previous forum topic") [Font of this association ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202133257/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43279 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jilliebean

comments.content: Probably custom, but you might dig [Shimano Square](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202133257/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/font_bureau/shimano_square_black/) or [FF Beekman](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202133257/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_beekman_square_bold/).
